item.title: How to reshape a dataframe from wide to long or long to wide format
item.description: Reshaping a dataframe / table from long to wide format or wide to long format is one of the daily tasks a Data Analyst / Data Scientist would be doing. The long format is similar to the tidy format that the tidyverse advocates. Even while, it’s been a very common task - the tidyr package’s solution of using spread() and gather() almost never was intuitive enough to be used in the code without SOing or Referring the documentation.
